resources.string: ResearchGate-Client is an unofficial web-based application built around the official https://www.researchgate.net/. This app doesn\'t have any Ads or trackers included. Moreover, no personal or private information about you or your device is collected or transmitted by this app.
Invite your friends to try ResearchGate-Client
Failed to connect to the internet!
Rate or/and Review ResearchGate-Client in PlayStore

Get ResearchGate-Client %s, an unofficial web-based application built around the official https://www.researchgate.net/, from PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunilpaulmathew.researchgateclient
ResearchGate-Client is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this application entirely free, non-intrusive and without ads, please consider supporting the development in some way. Click here to know more. Thank you!
Help me to translate this app! Click here to get the original language strings in english.
